name: Virus Defender
description:
Virus Defender!

Your computer has been infected with a deadly virus! You must go in and defeat it and its offspring before everything on your hard drive is compromised!

A top down shooter where you must eliminate the virus and its babies to win! Submitted for the CreativeWorks Weekly Game Jam #3, theme of "One". I decided to go with one level and one boss. There is also one power up, but you must find it!

CONTROLS:

WASD - Move Character

Mouse - Aim

Mouse Left Button - Shoot
